title: Reverend Al Sharpton Interview and more
itunes:title: Reverend Al Sharpton Interview and more
description:
Wednesday 8/23- Today on the show we had Reverend Al Sharpton come by where he spoke about the Minister March On Washington & More. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to UFC fighter Johnny Bones and Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
